sections.title: complete DMAIC loop (Define → Measure → Analyze → Improve → Control) with round-trip hooks.
artefact visibility + ranking + influence scores, both as a table and JSON graph.
human-readable YAML/MD artefacts: bios.yaml, kpi_template.yml, artefact_index.yml, and README excerpt.
patch & bundle scripts (patch_all.sh, patch_zip_userzip.sh) so you can spit out diffs and zips like a pro.
structured “verbatim” user input with scope + reduced summaries (structured_input.yaml).
smoke/regression tests (basic but real), so there’s at least something to fail besides our hopes.
CD plan & expected outcomes (promotion gates, observability, reproducibility).
generic agent roles for orchestration (pipeline_orchestrator, kpi_tracker, baseline_promoter, report_generator).
dashboard wireframe schema (JSON) to feed a live UI later.
short handover statement, because someone will inevitably ask “what is this?”
